artist: Barthélemy-Joseph Fulcran Roger; After Pierre-Paul Prud'hon
description: procession going left with Napoleon dressed as Roman emperor, standing on a horse-drawn chariot; Victory and Peace at his side;  winged putti carying an olive brance lead, followed by 3 Muses; at left various allegorical figures of Arts and Sciences
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: B. Roger sculp aqua forti  |  on sheet in pencil:2-308
title: Triumph  of Trajan
